title: SlavesConfiguration
description: All attached slaves must be defined in here.

alias.description: Slave's alias number (in integer or hexadecimal string).

position.description: Slave's position relative to master (in integer or hexadecimal string).

vendor_id.description: Slave's vendor id (in integer or hexadecimal string).

product_code.description: Slave's product code (in integer or hexadecimal string).

syncs.title: syncs
syncs.description: SM configurtion. Omit this field if the slave is a bus coupler, such as EK1100

watchdog_enabled.description: Watchdog status. If omitted, then it would be treated as false.

index.description: PDO CoE index (in integer or hexadecimal string).
SDO CoE index to be mapped to PDO (in integer or hexadecimal string).

subindex.description: SDO CoE subindex to be mapped to PDO (in integer or hexadecimal string).

size.description: Size in bit (in integer or hexadecimal string).

signed.description: This index is signed or unsigned integer.

parameters.title: parameters
parameters.description: List of Startup Parameters to be set before running ethercat instance.

index.description: Startup Parameter's CoE index (in integer or hexadecimal string).

subindex.description: Startup Parameter's CoE subindex (in integer or hexadecimal string).

size.description: Size in bit (in integer or hexadecimal string).

value.description: Startup Parameter's value to be set (in integer or hexadecimal string).
